description: This file defines a front-end UI component for tracking food orders within a React-like framework, utilizing Lightning.js for component structure. It manages order status polling, displays order details, and handles component lifecycle events.

classes.name: OrderTracking
classes.description: A Lightning.js component for tracking and displaying order status and ETA in a modal overlay.

methods.name: startPolling
methods.description: Starts polling the order status at regular intervals using API calls.

methods.name: stopPolling
methods.description: Stops the ongoing polling to prevent further API calls.
